grid.sql: select id, kood, nimetus, $2::integer as userId, tun1, tun2, tun3, tun4, tun5 from libs.library l where l.library = 'MAKSUKOOD' and l.status <> 3 and (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)

select.sql: select l.id, l.rekvid, l.kood, l.nimetus, l.muud, l.status, l.library, l.tun1, l.tun2, l.tun3, l.tun4, l.tun5, $2::integer as userid, 'MAKSUKOOD' as doc_type_id from libs.library l where l.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: select $1::integer as id , null::integer as tun1, null::integer as tun2, null::integer as tun3, null::integer as tun4, null::integer as tun5, $2::integer as userid, 'MAKSUKOOD' as doc_type_id, null::text as kood, null::integer as rekvid, null::text as nimetus, 'MAKSUKOOD'::text as library, 0::integer as status, null::text as muud

selectAsLibs.sql: select * from com_tululiigid l where (l.rekvId = $1 or l.rekvid is null)

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from libs.sp_delete_library($1::integer, $2::integer)
